forum.name: Reflecting on Session 4.5
forum.intro:
In Session 4.5, we engaged in excerpts from a formative assessment lesson. Reflect on this lesson and share your thoughts in the discussion forum below. You may wish to review the full lesson: Solving Linear Equations in One Variable.

Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum. Respond to the following:

  1. In what ways might you support productive struggle for your learners by engaging them in the formative assessment lesson Solving Equations in One Variable?
  2. How would you describe the role of the instructor during this lesson?

Remember to read and respond to others’ postings. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.) Consider using the following sentence frames in your responses:

  • I agree with your post because . . .
  • I had not thought about . . .
